fixes.name: WARR (bps)
fixes.dax_expression: SUMX('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)', 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Ut. US MM] * 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Repo Rate]) / SUM('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Ut. US MM])
fixes.solution_explanation: SUM([Ut. US MM]*[Repo Rate]) is implemented as SUMX over the table to compute the row-by-row product, divided by SUM of Ut. US MM. All column references converted to 'TableName'[Column] format.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation contains aggregations (SUM), so it should be created as a measure.
